      • assignAllowableActions

        protected void assignAllowableActions(int recoveryExceptionStart)
        Assign the correct generator of game.action based on the baseline options and exceptions. Will assign a broader set of options for "recovery" at the specified starting depth. Pass -1 to disable this.
